questions.png.description: A collection of thought bubbles with question marks

Simpsons_animation.gif.description: A scatter plot with multiple point clouds, each one showing a positive linear correlation. However, the clouds are staggered so that each one is lower on the y-axis than the last. Taken together, the entire set appears to have a negative correlation

multiple-models.png.description: A scatter plot showing multiple distinct correlations
multiple-models.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team based on data from https://www.OurWorldInData.com/covid

MA-covid.png.description: A scatter plot showing the exponential growth of covid infections in MA
MA-covid.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team based on data from https://www.OurWorldInData.com/covid

MA-covid-linear.png.description: A scatter plot showing the exponential growth of covid infections in MA, with multiple poorly-fitting linear models graphed on top
MA-covid-linear.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team based on data from https://www.OurWorldInData.com/covid

MA-covid-quadratic.png.description: A scatter plot showing the exponential growth of covid infections in MA, with multiple poorly-fitting quadratic models graphed on top
MA-covid-quadratic.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team based on data from https://www.OurWorldInData.com/covid

covid-scatterplot.png.description: A Desmos scatter plot showing the exponential growth of covid infections in MA
